website_summaries.verdict: While it's a bit of a chore to pull this option together, once assembled, the console looks great and the fire is lifelike.
pros: Console has a modern look with a lifelike "fire."
Quiet operation, and the heater throws a lot of heat
cons: Construction can take 3 to 4 hours, although you'll definitely help yourself out by completely reading the directions first
Some quality issues, including the fact that the wood scratches easily

customer_reviews.title: Fireplace is great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Took about 3 hours to put together. I bought the with one fireplace. Fairly easy to understand the directions. Make sure u use them thou, It not as easy it looks. Fireplace does get hot on screen. Keep little ones and pets away. To me seems very strong worth the money. Like in years to come it still be solid like is today. The backing is wood and not cardboard. The cabinets are deep but the unit doesnt sit very far off the wall. So very slim with alot room inside.
customer_reviews.author: curly q

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Done!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the fire place tv stand and was blown away. Took less than 2 1/2 hours, 1 person. Sturdy, strong and very nice expresso colored wood. Was very well packed and thank goodness because the shipping company was not kind. So great looking I am going to mount my tv so that that the fireplace is showcased in its own right. The heat is amazing- starts spewing out the moment and I mean the moment you turn it on! A great buy, I totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: Good stand and fire place
customer_reviews.text: At first when i opened the box..i was oh no..like 75 parts. Was thinking..no way this will hold good..untill the brackets..it is strong.. looks good. heavy and holds our 60" tv good. i like the fire place because you can just turn on heat or just the light that looks like fire. Very happy. If a 1 leg combat veteran can put it together..you can also..lol
customer_reviews.author: HillbillyRanger

customer_reviews.title: Fireplace stand
customer_reviews.text: This thing is an absolute nightmare to assemble and I'm a mechanic. It took almost 4 hours following the enclosed instructions. The unit is laminated particle board no where near the quality I was hoping. The manufacturer did a good job packing the unit but several of the pieces had scratches on them, they would be hard to see with knowing about them but I know and it bothers me. All things considered the unit looks nice upon completion.
customer_reviews.author: 1/504 Abn

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This unit is both attractive and useful. The electric heater works great; the logs look a little cheesy but it's still nice. It was a little difficult to put together, you definitely need two people. The horizontal shelves are in three small pieces, not one long one, so that increases the difficulty level with regard to getting everything lined up properly. It was a challenge getting the screws into the back of the heating unit as they are a little hard to reach. Being ambidextrous and wearing a visor light helps a great deal with this step. All in all, it's a good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: tanyaj

customer_reviews.title: Lots of damage to wood.
customer_reviews.text: I had a lot of damaged pieces. I need it to be put together the day I got so I I didn't have time to try and get replacement parts. Several of the pieces of wood had scratches and chips in them. Very poor quality if you ask me. Also don't feel like I should have to wait for parts to come in. They really need to work on the quality inspection before shipping stuff out to people.
customer_reviews.author: leslie

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money they catch on fire,  literally
customer_reviews.text: I've had this fireplace since August 2017. I live in the midwest so i mainly uses the fireplace 3 months out of the year, so maybe 6 months but not everyday. I turned in on last week to take the chill out of the room when i heard a surging noise, I look over and there were flames and sparks shooting out of the side and then heavy smoke before i was able to get in unplugged. Now to find an insert it will be atleast $150 for a fireplace that cost close to $300 and was used fur a total of maybe 200 hours
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping easy to assemble beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The fire place arrived in 3 days. I ordered with free shipping and I was about to cancel the order because free shipping expectancy was after December 3. But I was surprised because it arrived so fast. I put this together in 1 hour. Super easy instructions with every part labeled and large pictures with step by step. It is totally quiet and the fire looks very real. In minutes my entire living room as toasty. I am super happy with my romantic living room.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Silva

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in poor condition.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never bought anything that had so many scratches and dings before. Kind of frustrating when you get everything out of the box (which is very heavy) and then start putting together base and unwrapping pieces that are covered with scratches. By that time it would have been impossible to re-pack and send back. Went ahead and put it together and had to go buy the furniture markers to help cover it up.
customer_reviews.author: Michael O.

customer_reviews.title: Had over a month and love it
customer_reviews.text: We got it over a month ago. The shipping came sooner than we expected which was awesome. And have been using the heater the past week since it's been cold and it works great! Only thing I wish it had was a thermostat to adjust the tempature. But it still works great. And looks awesome. It took my husband an hour to build it. And it did get a few scratches on the top while building. But overall it's what we wanted and we like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: The unit is just as described & I like it a lot. It fits my space well and is a good support for the 55" TV. Very good storage on both sides of the fireplace. Fireplace is quite attractive & has a real appearance. I really like the space just below the TV which is adequate space for the dish receiver, DVD and info that I want readily available. Hired a contractor through Amazon to put it together. So glad I did. He did a wonderful job and was done in just over an hour
customer_reviews.author: RMC

customer_reviews.title: Takes a while to put together but it is worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this entertainment center with a fireplace. It is pretty and looks great in our livingroom. It did take a while to put together. My husband and I worked together on it it and took a little over 3 hours...however we have a 9 month old and I had to leave him at times cause of the baby. It has helped with putting things out of sight from the very active 9 month old. Also with the baby I love how sturdy it is. The heater warms our livingroom nicely, but it doesnt get hot so it is ok that our very active exploring baby touches it even if the heat is running.
customer_reviews.author: mamasmurf

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addition to my living room
customer_reviews.text: Excellent addition to my living room. I purchased a new 65" curved Samsung tv and this stand on which to put it. The stand is easy to assemble, but very durable and looks great. The tv fit with a little room to spare. Love the lower shelf (above the fireplace) to put a/v equipment and the dvr/receiver. The storage doors are nice, too. The fireplace lighting creates a nice ambiance without the nuisance of an actual fireplace. Highly recommend this piece for people looking for a gorgeous, useful, tv stand.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Moon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful item.
customer_reviews.text: According to other reviews you need to follow the directions. For the most part I agree. But when you get to step 12, you may want to wait until you put the fireplace heater in place. Doing instructions in order made it very difficult to screw the unit due to the "overhang". Otherwise, I love it. The directions are clear. Product came with no scratches on it, and unit works nicely.
customer_reviews.author: wolfpack4

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: We love it! It’s really nice looking. Some of the wood chipped during the process of putting it together which is annoying. It weighs over 100 pounds in the shipping box. We ended up having to go pick it up ourselves because they said they attempted to deliver it but did not. I waited all day at home for it and nobody ever knocked. Luckily my husband is strong, if I lived alone there’s no way I could have ever got that into my house alone. The heater works well, it definitely pumps heat out and I have small kids so I really like that the glass doesn’t get hot so you can’t get burned on it.
customer_reviews.author: Andi C

customer_reviews.title: Great looking addition to a basement or family room.
customer_reviews.text: The unit seems sturdy. I have a 65" TV and sound bar and there's plenty of room. The fireplace adds a nice bit of ambience and just a little heat/noise so you don't notice it too much if you're about 10' away. There's storage for dozens of blu-rays and games, and the extra shelf below the top shelf is handy for game consoles, Blu-ray players, etc. Assembly is time consuming (about 3 hours by myself) but it's not really complicated if you follow the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Bought this and the overall set up looks nice. It wasn't too difficult to put together but ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and the overall set up looks nice. It wasn't too difficult to put together but if you're like me and just start building without looking through the entire book, you'll be surprised to find that you build it from the bottom, up. That's right, you're building it upside down and once you're done you have to flip it right side up. So don't build in a tight area. Some of the edges didn't line up the cleanest, and one of the shelf supports cracked slightly but even so it's still pretty durable. The space heater also puts off a considerable amount of heat. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth the money. I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This console is really great. Took about 3 1/2 hours nonstop to assemble but was very, very easy directions to follow. It looks to be very sturdy as well so I have high hopes that it will last awhile. I've always wanted a fireplace and I finally got one at a great value. And ýes, the fireplace insert came with it.
customer_reviews.author: karen cranor

customer_reviews.title: Where is the remote
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea that when I ordered this it was going to be such an undertaking or that it would be so heavy. I thought this would be REAL wood. I am very machanically inclined but when you reach an area that has some holes that are off placing a delemma on trying to get other parts to line up it becomes tiresome to put together. It also would have been nice to have a remote so you don't have to continually get up to turn on and off and a temperature control would have been nice as well. I hope that my new Samsung will sit securely on top.
customer_reviews.author: stevie littrell

customer_reviews.title: a real pain
customer_reviews.text: It took 8 hours to assemble, lousy instructions and real inferior hardware fasteners. I've assembled dozens of furniture cabinets, shelves etc. and the cheap spring steel cogs that the screws tighten into are terrible and I broke 3 of them. It would have been nice to get extra hardware just in case. Also the "fireplace" fastening was a nightmare as well. It came out OK and the faux flames look nice. It is really strong and sturdy and looks good too, but it was a grueling assembly.
customer_reviews.author: dan pascale

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT, GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this product. My husband put it together and it took roughly 3-4 hours by himself. Not overly complicated, just a lot to do. Very heavy, but very sturdy and the heater works great. It says it heats up to 400 sqft but our living room is about 700 and it heats the whole room to a comfortable temp. It only took an extra day longer to deliver than originally stated, and none of the pieces were damaged on arrival. Solid packaging. It looks great and feels like a very reliable tv stand, especially for the price we paid. Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous piece, but be prepared to build, a LOT
customer_reviews.text: I love this, but oh MYYYYYY was it a lot to build. I didn't realize it would actually take a little over 2 hours for my husband and I to build it, and we're great at building furniture! The instructions were very clear though, so that was helpful in the process. Overall it works and looks great and the kids love the fireplace. It heats the room nicely and isn't hot so they can sit right by it.
customer_reviews.author: Misty C

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, not easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: These are good looking stands. When assembling this stand, make sure you put a soft rug underneath or else the surface will surely scratch. Caution - assemble the door and hinges last if you don't want to destroy those cabinet doors. con = no remote, and you can't adjust the heat flow
customer_reviews.author: Smart1

customer_reviews.title: Nice and good price
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect on my new 70 inch Samsung the fireplace is nice and warm just make sure you turn off the plug when your it using it It’s made from cheap particle wood but still kind of sturdy easy To chip from drill so be carful took 3 hours to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: It's holding up fine. It comes in alot of pieces
customer_reviews.text: I have a 55" tv, a home phone, a ps3,a wifi router,cablebox, android box. And then in the cabinets i have papers and games inside. It's holding up fine. It comes in alot of pieces. I took my time in assembling it and it turned out fine. It took me about 4 hours to build. In the end my family loves it. It warms up the living room. We have wood floors so we almost always have the fireplace on in the winter. I dont see why some people say it broke apart perhaps they rushed it? But after its build its pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Haze1092

customer_reviews.title: Looks Very Nice, but . . .
customer_reviews.text: It is a dust collector, and I should have gotten one with a thermostat for the heater. It does put out some heat, that's for sure, but if you don't manually turn it off and on, it can over do it. A remote control would have been nice too. They cost more, but when I'm relaxing in the recliner, the last thing I want to do is get up to either turn it on or off. It does look nice though. Oh, and it took me about three hours to assemble by myself. I treated it like a 3-D puzzle, and enjoyed every minute of it.
customer_reviews.author: Eerie Futible

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: Took about 4 1/2 hours to assemble. Me (48 yr old female) and 17 yr old daughter. Neither of us are diy experts. Assembly was easy, just time consuming. UPS damaged the box and I was quite worried, but this was packaged well and took no damage. This is VERY sturdy. The fireplace is nice. Puts out quite a bit of heat, and looks pretty. Not going to convince anyone it's real, but better than many.
customer_reviews.author: Shiachia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: It took my fiance approximately 3 hours to assemble, but it was well worth it. Quality materials and clear instructions. This was purchased to replace a smaller unit which is now in our bedroom. This matches living room decor perfectly and the sleek design gave us some square footage back as the older unit had a greater depth and sat out further.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Carol

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful In The Home, Fireplace Looks Great.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price with one exception: only supports a 75” TV if you also but a replacement centerpiece stand which I have done. The normal legs are too wide and overlaps the edge. The main supports on this are centered so for a large TV you will need to replace the TV legs.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: Give yourself 3-4 hours!!! It’s almost like your putting it together from scratch! I’m enjoying it though! Some parts arrived damage! But the company is very responsive to emails! The TV I have on this stand is a 65 inch Samsung curve!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy89

customer_reviews.title: Bad wiring Fire hazard
customer_reviews.text: Bought in March 2019 worked fine. Didn't use heater till October 4th 2019 as soon as I turned it on I saw smoke. Double checked all around the unit. Plugged it back in light comes on and the flame moves but no heat. I used it a total of about 20 to 30 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Valentin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This fit perfectly in the middle of my entertainment center. Fireplace small but pretty and heats up well. I Love it. A Good Buy. Affordable too. Better than paying a furniture note. Yes
customer_reviews.author: Shantral

customer_reviews.title: nice addition to living room and heat
customer_reviews.text: love this! its so nice to have a fake fireplace in the living room. I was concerned that the wood would get to hot from the heat, but it did not. no issues there at all. and it has a lot of storage and cabinet space. the heater definitely heats the room too, but it does come out pointing down toward the floor, not out to you if say you were on the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Finley

customer_reviews.title: Not really worth the money, time or aggravation
customer_reviews.text: I can’t get past the utter mess this thing arrives in! It’s in a million pieces, and they use the cheapest crappiest styrofoam that should never be used for anything . Everyone and everything was covered in this crap! Styrofoam stuck to us and the product from head to toe and you can’t get it off! I’m pretty disappointed, especially for this price.
customer_reviews.author: delighted

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I love a fireplace and just moved to northern Ohio so was concerned about the colder winters. I also did not have a real entertainment center. This is solid, spacious and very attractive. The cherry looks great with my other furniture. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very nice item. Assembly was not difficult as long as you go at your own pace and pay attention. This is a nice looking tv stand and was exactly what we were looking for. If it fits your decor you'll like this.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Peters

customer_reviews.title: The parts is not of good quality. The console is not sturdy when using ...
customer_reviews.text: The parts is not of good quality. The console is not sturdy when using the clamps provided. I am going to call a wood crafter to build and bring some sturdy material to hold the console together. I am not happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Choose another product
customer_reviews.text: Terrible piece of junk for the price. Arrived late causing us to incur additional moving expenses since we had rented a truck for the specific day it was to be delivered. Bottom pieces don't fit together and are completely cracked and useless.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Love / Hate relationship with particleboard products that you have ...
customer_reviews.text: Fireplace needs a remote and thermostat. Love / Hate relationship with particleboard products that you have to build. However if you go slow and take your time and not damage anything, it does turnout beautiful and is a very nice stand and look. Very polished and nice color.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Craft

customer_reviews.title: Looks are deceiving!!!
customer_reviews.text: The worst tv/fireplace cabinet I have ever built. Particle boards to thin for the size and weight. It requires 2 rocket scientist and engineers to assemble. The glued on paper laminate peels off and some boards could not be assembled due to wrong dowel placements.
customer_reviews.author: Lesss

customer_reviews.title: Entertainment stand with Class & Style.
customer_reviews.text: This entertainment stand was easy to assemble but it still took 2 people to build, it feels sturdy and adds character to my livingroom. A great buy for the money too.
customer_reviews.author: Eve Mojica

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So the package arrived, big heavy square box. Slid it into the house. Now mind you. I wouldn't suggest putting this together unless you aren't interrupted. By some beer and get started. Separate the parts by number. There are lots of them. The instructions were easy to follow and I am amazed how easy it went. About 2 hours, and was like.....WOW!! It came out nice, sturdy and supports my 70" tv perfectly. Fireplace works fantastic and adds a nice cozy feel. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Heater went out
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this thing. Very nice quality. In the winter I would keep it on all the time. Unfortunately the heater went out on it. If I could find replacement parts I would be happy. Kind of disappointed with how quickly it died..
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Bettmann

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Nice to sit in front of
customer_reviews.text: Very few scratches on back panel but each piece was very well packaged and separated to minimize any breakage or scratches. The fire place is so nice to look at. Many compliments from friends. Haven’t used the thermo part so I’m not sure how hot it can get
customer_reviews.author: Alanna Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell, but great and sturdy tv stand.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 stars because when we would turn on the fireplace, there was this bad odor, fishy smell that came from the fireplace. We’ve never turned it on since. Other than that it’s a great tv stand we’ve had it for 2years now and still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Sykia

customer_reviews.title: Easily scratches. Not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: The item looks nice but it came all scratched up. The box was not damaged but the material is fragile and will chip off and scratch easily. I wouldn't recommend it especially for how much it cost.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This is a Great tv console. It is sturdy. The heater is very simple to use. Turn it on when you want heat or keep it flipped off when you don't. The instructions are very thorough. It truly looks beautiful with the fireplace. And you can choose when the faux fireplace is on or off with the flip of a button. This adds so much to the viewing experience.
customer_reviews.author: nikky

customer_reviews.title: Easy as 123
customer_reviews.text: I would buy it again if only because of how easy it was to assemble. I would be nice if it had more than an off or on switch for the flames and heat.
customer_reviews.author: ALA A.

customer_reviews.title: Happy 😃
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty easy to assemble with two ppl. It took about 2.5 hrs. I do wish it was a little bit wider, but I made it work. We love it! The heat is pretty decent as well. Definitely if on a budget and want something nice this is the one for you. Great but!
customer_reviews.author: SUE GILBERT

customer_reviews.title: Looks neat, no issues
customer_reviews.text: I love it! We never had problems, looks as new, all the features work perfectly. Electrical fireplace looks very cozy, and can heat up the room as well. My kids love to warm up their hands/feet after plaing on the snow.
customer_reviews.author: Gosia86

customer_reviews.title: it is pretty much all 1/2" melamine particle board core
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I'll give it a 4 stars. Took about an hour and half to put together but I also work in cabinet industry. With that being said, it is pretty much all 1/2" melamine particle board core. Would be better with 5/8" so it would be more forgiving screwing parts together. If you don't screw dead center, you can blow out side of adjoining side. Take your time. Looks nice. Can't expect much more for price.
customer_reviews.author: gigedy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Fireplace is great.
customer_reviews.text: Once it's assembled it's a very nice looking piece. The fireplace works great and can warm up a small room in minutes. I have it in my basement where it's usually pretty cool and it can warm up the place without issues. Great buy. Only thing is that it takes some work to assemble but worth the time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Luis C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. Sturdy, we'll made and easy to put together(just follow the steps) time consuming, but easy to put together. Beware that the package is about 125 pounds. But once put together me and my wife loved it. Holds my new 70 inch tv perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Lee

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this Fireplace - TV Console
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this Fireplace - TV Console. As mentioned by others - it does take some time to put together (2-3 hours), but the instructions were very clear and not difficult at all. I was able to do it alone even though I was concerned I might need help. Looks gorgeous! You can turn on just the "Visual" for the Fireplace and I'm looking forward to testing out the heater as well (still 90 degrees here in Arizona in September) For the price this is a smoking hot deal.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Lavigne

customer_reviews.title: This unit is absolutely beautiful and it looks great in our family room
customer_reviews.text: This unit is absolutely beautiful and it looks great in our family room. It really adds a nice ambience to the area with the fire feature. And the added heat feature that emanate from the unit is also great although we don't really use that its still cool. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: what i expected
customer_reviews.text: The assembly took me about 1.5 hours to complete, not too difficult. It arrived with a couple small scratches but nothing major. Its heavy and not super sturdy to move around but its solid in its place i put it. It looks good with my 55 inch on it. The heater works fine, a little rattle but i only noticed it when there was no other noise in the room. It heats up my living room in about 10 minuets, The display is nice also.
customer_reviews.author: Pffft Whatever

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you build this cabinet before 30 days from purchase are up. Returns and replacement parts time expired.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fireplace to build and place in my future new home. More than 30 days passed before box was opened and therefore Amazon will not repair or replace parts. There are gaps in the cabinet where screw holes did not line up with cabinet.There are screws that were too long for the thickness of the wood and went through the finished cabinet. (And I made sure the correct screws were used for each area of the cabinet. I would have given this product 5 stars if parts had lined up correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Gramma Terri

customer_reviews.title: Must Have.
customer_reviews.text: Hands down one of the best investments I've ever made. Easy to assemble..2 1/2 hours from start to finish. Looks fantastic. Heats our living room quickly. Quiet. Plenty of storage space. I can't say enough about how fantastic this product is. Very pleased,will definitely recommend to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Romain

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cheap cheap
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap, the corkboard material falls apart as you try to screw the pieces in place. It was scratched up on the top of the unit and front. I am so disappointed, especially for the cost of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie W.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality in workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality in workmanship! This is your typical China Item that comes in a 2ftx2ft box. Material left in machined holes along with dowels holes being machined to deep. Chips in drilled holes for front door handles that had to be filled in with a magic marker. Assembly time is a solid 2 hours and make sure you have plenty of room. Also make sure you use only hand tools as its all press board and can easily be damaged.
customer_reviews.author: warren

customer_reviews.title: it's heavy looks great
customer_reviews.text: Its nice came alittle scratched up but the packaging is on point
customer_reviews.author: dennis s.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Not hard to put together. Instructions are clear and easy to follow. Took me 3 hours on my own. Heater is nice, the flames look a bit fake but overall it puts off nice heat.
customer_reviews.author: Benjen MacLeod

customer_reviews.title: It looked like something for an apartment rather than a house
customer_reviews.text: The TV stand that came with our huge 52" TV just wasn't cutting it anymore. It looked like something for an apartment rather than a house. So, after a few months of looking we decided to go with this and i absolutely LOVE IT!!! It is now the focal point of our living room and a great conversation starter. Everyone that comes into my home loves it!
customer_reviews.author: D. Lilley

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: I've assembled several tv stands over the the years and this is by far the most complicated. The quality is worse than poor.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Kershner

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price. Needs thermostat for fireplace.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to hold my TV in an apartment living room. This is like assembling ikea furniture. So make sure you’re up to the task. The faux fireplace is nice but not the best quality. It needs a thermostat. For the price, it’s a smart purchase. Overall, it looks nice. If you are looking for something inexpensive but still looks good, I recommend it. If you’re budget is flexible, I’d go higher end.
customer_reviews.author: happy camper

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: Took two people about 4 hours to assemble. Good directions, which you do need to follow. We installed it in motorhome. It does not come with a remote, which I assumed it did. Works with or without heat. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: JoD

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Fireplace
customer_reviews.text: The fireplace is beautiful, sturdy, and bigger than anticipated. I was looking for this particular shade of wood to match my current bedroom set, and the shade was spot on. My only complaint is that it took almost 4 hours to assemble; but for the look of the piece, the time spent putting it together was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kieanna

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but the wood is very poorly made
customer_reviews.text: The design and look are very good but the quality of the wood is very poor; it is a particle board with a very thin layer of aluminum on top of it. very fragile.The price does not match the product.
customer_reviews.author: peshmarga

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Holds my 65 inch tv no problem. Fire heater lower unit works great. Looks great in living room.
customer_reviews.author: Hlee

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent unit. So many say that they built it in 2 hours. I don't think they actually watched the clock. You will have more like 3 hours in this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Kimble

customer_reviews.title: Terrific tv stand and fireplace!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived this morning and my son put together while I was out afternoon Christmas shopping. Great tv stand and electric fireplace. Good heat output and ambience. Fantastic for value. Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mollie Reagan

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: I had a cousin help me. It is a great piece for a great price. Haven't used heater yet but works great.
customer_reviews.author: Diane obremski

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Love it, right now my 65 inch TV is sitting on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff W.

customer_reviews.title: So easy a grandma can assemble it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 62 year old grandma with arthritis and I put this together all by myself! Thank you for the best step by step instructions and predrilled holes and labeled everything!
customer_reviews.author: Ron and Suzie Giles

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Great stand! Fits my 65” tv great and the fire place is great for my basement! Easy to put together took about 3 hours! Very sturdy and great space in the cabinets..
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Had some damage
customer_reviews.text: Box came damaged and a few pieces in side were chipped at the corners and scratched. But with a bit of fixing up with wood polish it looks a bit better now. Just wish that it came in better condition.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Stone

customer_reviews.title: Meets expectations
customer_reviews.text: Loved the looks. Its worth the money. Tall and elegant. It was very hard to assemble. Took a couple of hours but at the end it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: zoila

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this product, the holes are not even to screw the screws, this is not good been sitting here for hours trying to get it together. To realize it's the product that's malfunctioned.. whoever drilled the holes didn't take their time with this product. they put them anywhere, so it can't be put together.
customer_reviews.author: Shadreika Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, warm and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The lack of remote is a dislike. Especially after the info shows pictures of one. The shelf itself is gorgeous and totally worth the money. Took two full grown men 3 hours to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Chips easily so be careful with the pieces
customer_reviews.text: Cheap particle board, very long building process which will require patience that I seem to lack, but I got it done. Chips easily so be careful with the pieces. Very nice looking after it's done and seems to be fairly sturdy for one of these types of units. For the price it's good. I am satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: joe732

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I must confess! When I saw the box! I didn’t know what to expect. This product is actually as advertised. My wife loves this item. We assembled it together. It was awesome! We put it together me and my wife. And she love it. Enough said! And the tv is huge and it fit with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bell

customer_reviews.title: Not quite enough storage space.... You will have to update new DVD player and surround sound
customer_reviews.text: I liked it but wasn't aware the top was 2 toned also the shelves are not big enough to fit my surround sound CD/ DVD player. I know that I had it for a long time but I wasn't planning on replacement it works fine but and I can't find anything else like it. I will have to replace with 2 separate items to do the same as one which is a bit costly..
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Sure it look very nice and elegant, but the material is super cheap and fragile. The top was torn through by one of the stands, the doors came strached. Do not buy.. save ur money! Now its built and no easy way to return it
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this console. Looks great but just as an FYI, the cherry color is VERY dark. Almost looks black in my living room. Great size, storage, and the heat element does a decent job. The price was amazing, which is why I liked it so much. As others have said, try to have a LOT of space to put this together. It does take time, but if you give yourself some room, it will be easy. They did a great job of labeling each piece. Simple!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kamedula

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the time nor money.. start it off the box was badly damaged. Then I opened hoping the items were okay, Looked fine until I started putting it together. PIECES SCRATCHED AND CRACKED OR CHIPPED!! Wanted something nice for the money but guess not! And if you want to test your relationship buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin s.

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Now I like this much better than the coffee table I got from these guys. Had tons of pieces but I just sat down and did it step by step and I really really like it. The fireplace looks cool. Glad I picked this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Came faster then expected, asambling took awhile but its absolutely worth it. Came with no defects, asambled easy just took some time, if you read instructions in detail there will be no problem, no any defects was on this tv stand that I had on matching coffee table that I ordered. Did i mention that Im soooo madly in love with this thing?! :)
customer_reviews.author: Monitka

customer_reviews.title: no idea what I thought
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize it came in 4000 pieces that you had to put together. If you want to test your marriage buy this little project..
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy for price and looks
customer_reviews.text: What I liked the most was the nice look of the fireplace and how real it looks.....The things I did not like very well was putting it together the instructions and the time it took to get to me....
customer_reviews.author: topseyturv50

customer_reviews.title: good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I was first uneasy when I opened the box and saw all those pieces. I hate assembling. But I have to say, the instructions were easy. step by step and after about 2 hours, I had my fireplace assembled. This a great looking piece, and adds character to the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this as a center piece of the wall and ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this as a center piece of the wall and it allows use of storage and entertainment devices. more to my liking is that it is full size and not a smaller piece as the asst. other pieces that could be bought for a living room. only drawback is the top material is the same as other pieces and bubbles will happen on the surface from liquids. Use coasters or do not get wet!
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Leavitt

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny! BUY BUY BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME!!! Not going to lie, was a chore to assemble but worth it! Plus with it being such nice quality it was great satisfaction seeing all together right after the last piece. I get a lot of compliments on it and they can't believe the price I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W Mckee

customer_reviews.title: you won't regret about this one.
customer_reviews.text: I love this TV set so much. The only part I don't like is it's hard to assemble all those parts.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel teshome

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done wile looking nice
customer_reviews.text: i recommend anybody who needs a heater and a tv stand to buy this one.. it gets the job done! Tv fits perfect and heater warms up the whole living room and some.. wish the heater blower was in the bottom instead of the top so it can warm the floor a bit as well but for now I can’t complain! I love it
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: The heater is trash
customer_reviews.text: the tv stand is good but the heater didn't blow heat so I contacted them and they sent me a new one and that one only worke for 3 months
customer_reviews.author: Angela loberg

customer_reviews.title: Good for it’s price
customer_reviews.text: It took 2-3 hours to assemble, very sturdy. It does scratch easily so you might want to be careful when building but it’s good for its price.
customer_reviews.author: V. Rodri

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Labor intensive and time consuming to put together. We like the look of it and it works great for the space.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Broderick

customer_reviews.title: Great for the bedroom.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, heats 420 sq. feet very nicely. Saves energy in the rest of the house.
customer_reviews.author: too many pants

customer_reviews.title: Dents
customer_reviews.text: There were multiple dents and some scratches. Instructions are kinda goofy. They dont write out what you need to do just have to go off pictures. I personally love it. My wife was just upset that we paid so much for it and it came banged up. The dog loves it aswell.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Comes in 700 pieces
customer_reviews.text: Go to Home Depot and get 30 pieces to make it Yourself instead of the 700 pieces that come in the box. Product is as good as the 10 days it takes you to become a veteran Carpenter nothing but small piece by small piece. Can't get any more Brutal. What a Bust to receive it like this.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Berry

product_meta.title: Ameriwood Home Carson Electric Fireplace TV Console for TVs up to 70",  Cherry
product_meta.description: Style Name:TV Console| Color:CherryCreate a cozy space in your home with the Ameriwood Home Carson Electric Fireplace TV Console. The cherry finish gives this TV Console a modern aesthetic sure to complement any room’s décor. The Stand is constructed of laminated particleboard with metal accents. The 18” firebox insert allows you to enjoy the ambiance of the flame with or without heat, and it features a LED light source boasting up to 50,000 hours of life. The Carson Electric Fireplace TV Console warms rooms up to 400 sq. ft. and also provides added storage with 2 large cabinets and open shelving to organize your gaming consoles, TV receivers, books, magazines and remotes. The Fireplace TV Console ships flat to your door and requires assembly upon opening. Two adults are recommended for assembly. The Console’s top holds up to a 70” flat paneled TV with a maximum weight of 135 lbs. Once assembled it measures out to be 26”H x 63.1”W x 18”D.
feature_bullets: Spruce up your living room with the Ameriwood Home Carson Electric Fireplace TV Console for TVs up to 70” with a maximum weight of 135 lbs

Made from laminated particleboard with metal accents, the cherry finish gives the Stand a modern look perfect for any style.Care - Dust and wipe with a dry cloth and if needed, a damp cloth may be used sparingly

Two large cabinets and open shelving keep your gaming consoles, cable box, DVD and Blu-ray players, and audio system organized and easy to reach. The 18” firebox insert can warm a room up to 400 sq. ft. and allows you to enjoy the ambiance of the flame with or without heat. The energy efficient LED light has up to 50,000 hours of life
Complete your living room with the Carson Coffee Table, End Table, and Audio Stand in the Cherry and Black or Espresso finish (each sold separately)

The Fireplace TV Console ships flat to your door and 2 adults are recommended for assembly. The top holds up to a 70” flat paneled TV with a maximum weight of 135 lbs. The open shelving will hold up to 30 lbs. and the adjustable shelves behind each door hold 10 lbs. while the fixed shelves hold 15 lbs. each. Assembled dimensions: 26”H x 63.1”W x 18”D
With over 30 years' experience in RTA furniture, Ameriwood Home offers a wide range of home furniture products for every room of the house

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars715 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Material Care Instructions: Dust and wipe with a dry cloth and if needed, a damp cloth may be used sparingly.
